title: We Need To Talk About Palworld - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.22.24
description:
Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames

Greg and special guest Andrea Rene talk about everything going on with Palworld.

Follow Andrea: https://twitter.com/andrearene

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:14 - Housekeeping
 - Kinda Funny Happy Hour preview is live because we’re doing a new one Wednesday! This is where we field calls and party with the $25 Patrons, so come hang out!
 - We’re proud to announce that we’ve teamed up with the indie exchange for the ULTIMATE spring game showcase! The game submission deadline for the MIX/KF Spring Showcase is Feb 2nd. Head to kindafunny.com/SpringShowcase to get your game submitted.
    - The Roper Report   -
00:05:31 - Palworld Has Huge Weekend and Sells 5 Million
00:11:45 - Palworld Pokémon plagiarism accusations pile up as CEO responds
REQUIRED READING: https://twitter.com/DBakaba/status/1749122283346473182 
00:31:04 - BREAKING: Palworld Coming to PS5?
00:37:17 - WWE 2K24 Release Date Announced, Cover Star Revealed
00:49:30 - Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth Limits New Game Plus Access to Digital Deluxe and Ultimate Editions
00:56:04 - Wee News!
00:56:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Special Guest!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

at VGC the director of steam's colossal breakout hit po world has responded to allegations of plagiarisms as ACU accusations Mount that the game could have copied Pokémon designs since launching into Early Access on PC and Xbox on Friday power world has become a huge breakout success however the survival game success ignited discourse around perceived similarities between its characters designs and those of the Pokemon games although the actual gameplay of pal world is vastly different from Nintendo series debate has raged on social media around the obvious influence its character designs have taken from Pokemon and whether it could be interpreted as as plagiarism on Monday the game's director and CEO of developer pocket pair uh takuru Mobi uh posted a response to the AC accusations while he did not deny any influence from Pokemon he claimed the games artists have received online abuse and called for to stop quote we are currently receiving abusive and defamatory comments against our
